message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on this product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $15000. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $16500. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $16000. This price still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.

Hi Bob, I'm still not comfortable with $16000. However, I'm willing to come down a bit further. I can offer it to you for $16200. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued negotiation efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $16000. This price still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to consider other options.

Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet at $16000. While this is closer to my budget, I still feel there might be room for further discussion. I would like to propose an offer of $15900. This price allows us both to find common ground.

Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go down to $15900. I've already compromised a lot, and I think $16000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I can offer it to you for $15950. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer and understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $15800. This price allows us both to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
